alert.note: Alert for Clinch (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:25PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clinch County through 200 PM EDT... At 125 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Du Pont, or 11 miles southwest of Homerville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Du Pont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
